title: [Ridiculous Skin Suggestion] -- Star Guardian GAREN. It makes sense. Trust me.
body:
So...I don't normally post skin ideas since I don't actually have much artistic ability where sketch art is concerned, but I had an idea I absolutely wanted to share: **STAR GUARDIAN GAREN.**

Star Guardian Garen begins the game as Lux, with an assembly animation similar to that of Super Galaxy Rumble. She undergoes a "magical girl transformation sequence," ending up in a hulking robot suit of pink, white, and gold metal, with Lux's head still visible between the suit's massive shoulder guards.

Again, I don't have art, but here's a random google image search with a similar idea:

https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736x/ac/47/a6/ac47a66be9934080e1f707bd4f1db100.jpg

The ability effects would involve a glowing sword (possibly made of magical energy), lots of stars and hearts and rainbow colors, and **Demacian Justice** would drop a shining rainbow sword from the sky.

You'd redo the voice lines with Lux's actress, which might mean this would need to be a Legendary or Ultimate skin -- which is fine, as I'd love an excuse to turn ALL the music into the sort of cheesy recall music that Star Guardian Lux has.

Thoughts? Suggestions? Complaints? Personal insults?

See, that one seems odd to me, since it's entirely out of theme. Magical Fantasy Girl puts on a Space Mecha Suit? Okay. Magical Fantasy Armadillo? Absolutely HILARIOUS, but definitely out of keeping with the skin theme. :P

I think a great traditional Star Guardian line-up would be Lux, Leona, Ashe (sparkly effects would work great on her), Riven, and Vi.
You forgot {{champion:44}}
Im sure he will get it once he gets his rework.

> [{quoted}](name=DreamofFantasy,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=EbtzelJ6,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-12-16T01:03:51.945+0000)

> ....I have a little too much time on my hands
> http://imgur.com/dU7SHfV

While this is definitely hilarious, the idea is that the character is actually Lux. She's just wearing robotic armor that gives her the build of Garen, and holding a sword made of light.

I do love this sketch though. I love it a lot.
Make this about {{champion:44}}  and you have my vote.
See, Taric could be a legitimate Star Guardian in his own right. I just loved the idea of replacing Garen with Lux in a robot Garen mech suit. :-P

For those of you curious about the model, the image the OP showed is a kitbash. The body and head come from Makoda figure, while the limbs come from a 1/100 scale Gundam Age-1 Titus, as pictured here posing on my kitchen table.

http://imgur.com/1Gu50Zg

ya i see what your saying and its an awesome idea i would buy that in a n instant but rito should make garen, lux, taric, and even ezreal into a whole panoramic of skins like they did with the ace of spades skins and PROJECT: Skins

See, Taric, Ezreal, and maybe even Braum would be hilarious Star Guardians in their own right. I completely agree.

The idea behind this was to just turn Lux INTO Garen via Magical Girl Mecha Armor, basically. Because it amused me. :P
